gems.name: google-cloud-bare_metal_solution-v2
gems.info: Bare Metal Solution is a managed solution that provides purpose-built HPE or Atos bare-metal servers in regional extensions that are connected to Google Cloud by a managed, high-performance connection with a low-latency network fabric. Note that google-cloud-bare_metal_solution-v2 is a version-specific client library. For most uses, we recommend installing the main client library google-cloud-bare_metal_solution instead. See the readme for more details.
